nycTheatreExcerpt: After years of analyzing plays for their achievements and blunders, it's rare for me to walk out of a theater with a single thought in my mind: I loved it. And yet those three words floated in my brain after Jocelyn Bioh's new Broadway comedy Jaja's African Hair Braiding at Manhattan Theatre Club's Friedman Theatre.
